snippet: A man who's been standing along the state highway through his town with a sign pleading for a kidney donor says he's not so desperate he'd accept an organ from a man on Oregon's death row for killing his wife and three children....

headline.print_headline: Death Row Kidney? Desperate Oregon Man Says No
headline.main: Death Row Kidney? Desperate Oregon Man Says No

lead_paragraph: A man who's been standing along the state highway through his town with a sign pleading for a kidney donor says he's not so desperate he'd accept an organ from a man on Oregon's death row for killing his wife and three children.
